title: Carson Wentz Foot Surgery & Training Camp Whispers
itunes:title: Carson Wentz Foot Surgery & Training Camp Whispers
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL including Carson Wentz potentially out for 5-12 weeks (9:23) and Nick Chubb getting an extension (18:18). Jamal Adams is doing a "hold in" (22:20) and Kirk Cousins is on the Covid list. We spin through some of our favorite trading camp "whispers" (31:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
